    • buildParam

      private ast buildParam(Stack<StackElement> st, TokenType function) throws exceptions.ExpressionException
      Build a '()' expression
      Parameters:
      st - stack contains all elements
      function - function call type, if not cos, sin, min, max, then we will ignore it
      Returns:
      the ast node
      Throws:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - if error occurs
